TextLibrary.Text: What did you learn this time?
What did you learn this time?
I learned how to avoid Heavy Cruiser Class ships. The Leader of The Lost was the one who actually enabled them to escape the MRI. He had a special power, but they would not tell me what it was.
I learned how to avoid Heavy Cruiser Class ships. The Leader of The Lost was the one who actually enabled them to escape the MRI. He had a special power, but they would not tell me what it was.
